creator: nickisch@t-online.de
text:
I would like to have a move (rename) action for the FTP task.
The task should make something like rename foo.txt foo.txt.old.

I have created such a task  in the

org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.net.FTP.java 

source from ANT 1.6.1 which I could provide.

creator: antoine@apache.org
text: *** Bug 30176 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: antoine@apache.org
text:
Stefan, can you attach your diffs 
to the bug report ?

cvs diff -u src/main/org/apache/tools/ant/taskdefs/optional/net/FTP.java

Created attachment 12461
I'm using eclipse, which changed the formatting, so it is a long diff.
